name: Bob Thorman
text: Really nice Pizza Hut with really nice people working here. The pizza was very good. Try the Italian Sausage, Bacon, and Jalapeno. Very good. I had it on thin crust, well done. Delicious. The only critique I have was the garden salad and blue cheese dressing. Poured that salad right out of a bag. Dressing was nasty.
